item.title: Betrayer
item.description: [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|He walks the stairs and stands at the door.]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|Bottle in his right,]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.md#let-the-fun-and-games-begin-vyl-wnanory|Fist in his left clenched tight.]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/we_are_not_alone/breakdown.

item.title: Brighter
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/purple/interstate_love_song.md#leavin-on-a-southern-train-vyl-wnanory|The night, the night is darkest just before dawn, just before dawn.]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/purple/interstate_love_song.md#leavin-on-a-southern-train-vyl-wnanory|So we search for brighter days.]] [[songs/s/stone_temple_pilots/purple/interstate_love_song.md#leavin-on-a-southern-train-vyl-wnanory|Trudging through fields of deceit.

item.title: Carry On
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/rise_up/get_it_anyway.md#so-let-em-hear-the-cellar-by–the-collar-vyl-wnanory|Carry on. Overcome.]] [[songs/l/lana_del_rey/born_to_die/summertime_sadness.md#im-feelin-electric-tonight-vyl-wnanory|The lies that floods our compromise. The day is getting darker.]] [[songs/l/lana_del_rey/born_to_die/summertime_sadness.md#im-feelin-electric-tonight-vyl-wnanory|Your past that fuels the pain inside.

item.title: Catalysts
item.description: [[songs/m/michael_oakley/california/rabbit_in_the_headlights.md#its-gotta-be-me—theres-no-way-vyl-wnanory|When will we, when will we surrender?]] [[songs/m/michael_oakley/california/rabbit_in_the_headlights.md#its-gotta-be-me—theres-no-way-vyl-wnanory|When will we strive for what is good and not for what man has created?

item.title: Caving
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/a_thousand_suns/waiting_for_the_end.md#what-was-left-when-that-fire-was-gone-vyl-wnanory|My life leaks away,]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/a_thousand_suns/waiting_for_the_end.md#what-was-left-when-that-fire-was-gone-vyl-wnanory|Groan by groan.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/a_thousand_suns/waiting_for_the_end.md#what-was-left-when-that-fire-was-gone-vyl-wnanory|My years are fading in sighs.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/a_thousand_suns/waiting_for_the_end.md#what-was-left-when-that-fire-was-gone-vyl-wnanory|I am growing weary.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/a_thousand_suns/waiting_for_the_end.md#what-was-left-when-that-fire-was-gone-vyl-wnanory|I am growing weary.

item.title: Desolate
item.description: [[songs/t/the_church/starfish/reptile.md#had-you-coiled-around-my-arm-vyl-wnanory|What have I gained]] [[songs/t/the_church/starfish/reptile.md#had-you-coiled-around-my-arm-vyl-wnanory|By giving the world my everything?]] [[songs/t/the_church/starfish/reptile.md#had-you-coiled-around-my-arm-vyl-wnanory|It’s never been such a struggle]] [[songs/t/the_church/starfish/reptile.md#had-you-coiled-around-my-arm-vyl-wnanory|To regress to what I was yesterday.

item.title: Greater
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/wicked_game.md#the-world-was-on-fire-and-noone-could-save-me-but-you-vyl-wnanory|Every breath I take recalls the wretch I once was,]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/wicked_game.md#the-world-was-on-fire-and-noone-could-save-me-but-you-vyl-wnanory|The wretch I remain.]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/wicked_game.md#the-world-was-on-fire-and-noone-could-save-me-but-you-vyl-wnanory|Fueled by hatred, by greed.]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/wicked_game.

item.title: Humane
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|We will bring fire to the empires. The imperial, they won’t prevail.]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|We will raise. Raise that banner above it all.

item.title: Hurt
item.description: [[songs/j/johnny_cash/the_legend_of_johnny_cash/hurt.md#i-hurt-myself-today-to-see-if-i-still-feel-vyl-wnanory|I hurt myself today to see if I still feel. I focus on the pain, the only thing that’s real.

item.title: I Hold The Key
item.description: [[songs/e/enter_shikari/sorry_youre_not_a_winner_ok_time_for_plan_b/sorry_youre_not_a_winner.md#scratch-card-glory-or-waist-low-pleasure-vyl-wnanory|I’m fed up, I’m fed up with the constant flow. Getting lost in the rhythm.]] [[songs/e/enter_shikari/sorry_youre_not_a_winner_ok_time_for_plan_b/sorry_youre_not_a_winner.md#scratch-card-glory-or-waist-low-pleasure-vyl-wnanory|Cadences of disdain, melodies without satisfaction.

item.title: Live Today
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#ten-proper-years-of-bringin-funk-vyl-wnanory|I’m gonna live today, live to make a change.]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#ten-proper-years-of-bringin-funk-vyl-wnanory|There comes a time in every life when it’s time to move on.

item.title: Monumental Part I
item.description: [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|“Give up yourself and you will find your real self. Lose your life and you will save it.”]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/jesus_forgive_me_i_am_a_thot.md#pray-pray-pray-vyl-wnanory|“Give up yourself and you will find your real self.

item.title: Monumental Part II
item.description: [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.md#inspired-enough-to-one-day-grow-up-blow-up-and-be-in-a-position-vyl-wnanory|The world is in pieces, it’s falling apart. Our lives are being shut down.]] [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.md#inspired-enough-to-one-day-grow-up-blow-up-and-be-in-a-position-vyl-wnanory|Years gone by. When will we try not living for ourselves, not living for man.

item.title: Passion
item.description: [[songs/q/queens_of_the_stone_age/songs_for_the_deaf/you_think_i_aint_worth_a_dollar_but_i_feel_like_a_millionaire.md#dead-bull-with-the-life-from-the-low-vyl-wnanory|Looking now with new sight, new sight to see it all.]] [[songs/q/queens_of_the_stone_age/songs_for_the_deaf/you_think_i_aint_worth_a_dollar_but_i_feel_like_a_millionaire.md#dead-bull-with-the-life-from-the-low-vyl-wnanory|A void with the cruelest intentions.]] [[songs/q/queens_of_the_stone_age/songs_for_the_deaf/you_think_i_aint_worth_a_dollar_but_i_feel_like_a_millionaire.md#dead-bull-with-the-life-from-the-low-vyl-wnanory|Why aren’t we taking what is ours?

item.title: Remain & Sustain
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#the-fames-your-best-friend-you-love-it-no-questions-vyl-wnanory|I can’t put back together all these pieces, if everything around me stays the same.]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#the-fames-your-best-friend-you-love-it-no-questions-vyl-wnanory|Why do I compromise the convictions that I have.

I can’t find stability.]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#the-fames-your-best-friend-you-love-it-no-questions-vyl-wnanory|I’m not okay. I can’t find stability.]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#the-fames-your-best-friend-you-love-it-no-questions-vyl-wnanory|Threading through my faith with a needle named doubt.

item.title: Rise
item.description: [[songs/d/deftones/white_pony/pink_maggit.md#we-are-vyl-wnanory|You are my everything.]] [[songs/d/deftones/white_pony/pink_maggit.md#we-are-vyl-wnanory|You are my everything.]]

item.title: Shine
item.description: [[songs/d/dire_straits/the_best_of_dire_straits__mark_knopfler__private_investigations/walk_of_life.md#here-come-johnny-singing-oldies-goldies-vyl-wnanory|We are tattered men.]] [[songs/d/dire_straits/the_best_of_dire_straits__mark_knopfler__private_investigations/walk_of_life.md#here-come-johnny-singing-oldies-goldies-vyl-wnanory|Nothing but mirrors of the walls we’ve built.]] [[songs/d/dire_straits/the_best_of_dire_straits__mark_knopfler__private_investigations/walk_of_life.md#here-come-johnny-singing-oldies-goldies-vyl-wnanory|I’ve built a high gate and I’ve invited destruction.

item.title: Sinking
item.description: [[songs/p/petula_clark/downtown/downtown.md#just-listen-to-the-rhythm-of-a-gentle-bossa-nova-vyl-wnanory|It’s so hard to make an effort,]] [[songs/p/petula_clark/downtown/downtown.md#just-listen-to-the-rhythm-of-a-gentle-bossa-nova-vyl-wnanory|To keep my surroundings in line.]] [[songs/p/petula_clark/downtown/downtown.md#just-listen-to-the-rhythm-of-a-gentle-bossa-nova-vyl-wnanory|When sometimes, I can’t do it for myself.

item.title: Soul
item.description: [[songs/s/sonic_youth/dirty/sugar_kane.md#youre-perfect-in-the-way-vyl-wnanory|If I had a fist for every time I’ve been trapped, I’d fight my way out and I’d never look back.

item.title: Sun
item.description: [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/vicious_delicious/artillery.md#yo-yo-vyl-wnanory|The sun rises and the sun sets]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/vicious_delicious/artillery.md#yo-yo-vyl-wnanory|And hurries back to where it rises.]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/vicious_delicious/artillery.md#yo-yo-vyl-wnanory|Wind to the south, and wind to the north.

item.title: We Can Take Them All
item.description: [[songs/i/inxs/shabooh_shoobah/the_one_thing.md#you-know-your-voice-is-a-love-song-vyl-wnanory|Is this the end of everything? It’s all falling down, it’s all crashing down.]] [[songs/i/inxs/shabooh_shoobah/the_one_thing.md#you-know-your-voice-is-a-love-song-vyl-wnanory|Everyone’s telling me to focus on my dreams, but I can’t lift my head from the suffering below.

item.title: Weathered Town
item.description: [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|Looking in the rear-view mirror at everything that I’m leaving behind.]] [[songs/m/massive_attack/heligoland/splitting_the_atom.md#the-baby-was-born-vyl-wnanory|I know this is right, I know it’s my time.

item.title: Willows
item.description: [[songs/m/marilyn_manson/the_golden_age_of_grotesque/tainted_love.md#once-i-ran-to-you-i-ran-vyl-wnanory|Why am I wasting my time pleasing people around me?]] [[songs/m/marilyn_manson/the_golden_age_of_grotesque/tainted_love.md#once-i-ran-to-you-i-ran-vyl-wnanory|I’m sick of waiting around for nothing, for nothing.]] [[songs/m/marilyn_manson/the_golden_age_of_grotesque/tainted_love.
